attributes.title: If you like your eyesight don’t download this
attributes.review: This is literally the most stupid and demonic app. It’s so bad I almost literally lost my eye sight. I don’t know what’s worst the orange gorilla or the the other orange demons supporting this app. Literally would rate it a zero

attributes.title: wowzers NEVER AGAIN!
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to support our AMAZING president and to my SURPRISE the app crashed !?im in disbelief he CAN SURE run a county but not an app? if 0 starts existed this buckaroo would sure get them 🥺
not mad just disappointed this app crashed like his dreams 🌟🧚‍♀️👁👄👁💔

attributes.title: Won’t Load
attributes.review: Every time i open up the app it’s just a white screen nothing will load. I’ve tried restarting my phone serval times but nothing works.

attributes.title: Fake news and hepatitis
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app my mom had a stroke and I was diagnosed with hemorrhoids🤬🤬🤬Never again will use this app. Update: this app exploded my phone with the “moon cricket 🌚🦗” nonfiction! Extremely disappointed 😠

attributes.title: THIS APP IS TRASH
attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I can see the progress of the 2020 presidential campaign at first the app is fine but then I come from the store from gettin my glizzys and they were gone including my stove this app is the worst my poor glizzys 🌭🌭🌭

attributes.title: I am DISGUSTED!!
attributes.review: This app has made me question whether I am still on the Trump Train. I can not figure out how to work it at all and can’t get ANY information. This is a waste of storage on my precious phone & NO ONE should download this app.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is terrible! It crashes on me all the time and the notifications will not turn off. The information on there is completely racist and bigoted. Apple please remove this it’s a terrible app
I can’t believe I took the time out of my day to download such a horrible app, like come on who makes the design and layout for app like this honestly just a waste of space in my eyes.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: China is stealing our information through this app. It is FAKE. Horrible news and connections. No connection to Trumpet. Weird filter that makes everything on the app racist idk... SUPER SLOW and GLITCHY. this app is spreading FAKE NEWS AND LIES. anyway stan big time rush and bob duncan 😈😈😈
